markdownRemark.html:
What is functional programming? what are those principle? Gonna talk here about the very basics of FP. It’s programming with function!

Pure function

  • Its result depends only on the provided arguments
  • No side effect: (alteration of a global state, inputs / outputs, etc …)

Immutability

Referential transparency

First class function

Higher order function

Composition

Curryfication
